activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The work'e'r is cleaning the tools.
Does the instructor always replace the filt'e'r in the pump?

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular, Yes/No questions, WH-questions

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

tables: What kind of food does he cook?

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Indian dishes on Tuesday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Indian dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: She prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Thai dishes on Monday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Thai dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares Thai dishes on Tuesday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare German dishes on Thursday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare German dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare German dishes on Thursday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare German dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Swiss dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Swiss dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Swiss dishes on Friday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Sri Lankan dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Sri Lankan dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Sri Lankan dishes on Sunday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare French dishes on Wednesday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare French dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares French dishes on Thursday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Japanese dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Japanese dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Japanese dishes on Saturday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Indian dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Indian dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Does John learn about workshop safety and tool handling on Monday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he learns about the lathe machine.

content.sentence: Does he follow a class on engineering drawing on Tuesday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he follows a class on drilling.

content.sentence: Does John have a session on bench fitting and filing on Wednesday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he has a session on engineering drawing and symbols.
content.answer: No, he doesn’t, but he has a session on engineering drawing and symbols.

content.sentence: Does he attend a theory lesson on lathe machine operations on Thursday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he attends a lesson on fluid mechanics.

content.sentence: Does John study strength of materials on Friday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he studies metallurgy.

content.sentence: Does he practise drilling and tapping on Monday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he practises welding.

content.sentence: Does John join a session on lathe turning practice on Tuesday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he joins a session on welding and fabrication.
content.answer: No, he doesn’t, but he joins a session on welding and fabrication.

content.sentence: Does he learn about milling machines on Wednesday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he learns about heat treatment of metals.

content.sentence: Does John take part in gear cutting practice on Thursday afternoon?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he takes part in drilling and milling.

content.sentence: Does he do maintenance procedures on Friday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he does CNC machine practice.

content.sentence: Does John assemble machine components on Monday afternoon?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he assembles motor parts.

activity_b.text: Does he follow a class on engineering drawing on Tuesday morning?
Does John have a session on bench fitting and filing on Wednesday morning?
Does he attend a theory lesson on lathe machine operations on Thursday morning?
Does John study strength of materials on Friday morning?
Does he practise drilling and tapping on Monday before lunch?
Does John join a session on lathe turning practice on Tuesday before lunch?
Does he learn about milling machines on Wednesday before lunch?
Does John take part in gear cutting practice on Thursday afternoon?
Does he do maintenance procedures on Friday before lunch?
Does John assemble machine components on Monday afternoon?

activity_a.text:
Match the words to their definitions.
පදයන් ඔවුන්ගේ අර්ථයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
சொற்களை அவற்றின் வரையறைகளுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_b.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_e.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.item_b: a machine used to shape or cut metal
a tool used for measuring small distances accurately
a section in the workshop where machines are kept
a clear cover that protects the face during work
a technical picture showing machine parts
a place where mechanical work is done

Questions.question: What time does Kavindu arrive at the Mechanical Technology section?
Does Kavindu have Mechanical Drawing and Measurement on Wednesday morning?
What does he do on Friday afternoon?
Questions.answer: He works on the Lathe Machine Operation.
options: He works on the Lathe Machine Operation.

Questions.question: Does he switch on the machines before the instructor checks them?
Does Kavindu leave anything on the floor after lunch?
options: Only when he is in a hurry.

activity_c.text: Every weekday, Kavindu arrives at the Mechanical Technology section at a quarter to eight.
Does he come late?
No, he doesn’t.
He always comes early because he wants to check the machines and tools before class.
He stands in line with the other trainees for the morning assembly.
He doesn’t talk while the instructor checks attendance and gives safety instructions about workshop machines.
The timetable shows theory sessions in the morning and practical sessions in the afternoon.
On Mondays, Kavindu studies Workshop Safety and Machine Tools.
On Wednesday morning, he learns about Mechanical Drawing and Measurement.
Does he enjoy it?
Yes, he does.
He likes drawing machine parts and using vernier calipers for measurement.
On Friday afternoon, he works on the Lathe Machine Operation.
He doesn’t miss any task because every session helps him become a better technician.
At 8:30 a.m., the first class starts.
Does Kavindu go to the workshop first?
No, he doesn’t.
He stays in the classroom for theory.
He doesn’t switch on the machines before the instructor checks the settings.
His instructor wants him to complete the theory notes first.
At 10:45, Kavindu has a tea break.
He usually drinks plain tea in the canteen.
But sometimes he sits near the machine bay with his friends.
Do they eat snacks every day?
No, they don’t.
They have snacks only on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.
After the break, Kavindu goes to the mechanical workshop.
He uses different tools and follows safety procedures carefully.
He doesn’t forget his gloves, shoes, or face shield.
His instructor walks around and checks his turning and cutting operations.
He eats lunch at 12:30 and cleans his work area.
He doesn’t leave any metal pieces or oil spills behind.
The day ends at 4:15 p.m.
Does he feel tired?
Yes, he does, but he feels proud because he learns something new every day.

activity_d.text: Every weekday, Kavindu arrives at the Mechanical Technology section at a quarter to eight.
He stands in line with the other trainees for the morning assembly.
He doesn’t talk while the instructor checks attendance and gives safety instructions about workshop machines.
On Mondays, Kavindu studies Workshop Safety and Machine Tools.
He doesn’t miss any task because every session helps him become a better technician.
He doesn’t switch on the machines before the instructor checks the settings.
He usually drinks plain tea in the canteen.
But sometimes he sits near the machine bay with his friends.
He uses different tools and follows safety procedures carefully.
He doesn’t forget his gloves, shoes, or face shield.
